Architecture: amd64 arm64 armel ia64 m68k mips64el mipsel ppc64el riscv64 loong64 all
Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), quilt, dh-sequence-python3, bc, libboost-system-dev, libboost-date-time-dev, libboost-test-dev, zlib1g-dev, gfortran, pkgconf, lsb-release, libtool, doxygen, texlive-latex-extra, texlive-latex-recommended, ghostscript, libopm-grid-dev (>= 2024.04~), libopm-models-dev (>= 2024.04~), mpi-default-dev, mpi-default-bin, python3-dev, libpython3-dev, pybind11-dev, libhdf5-mpi-dev
Package-List: libopm-simulators deb libs optional arch=amd64,arm64,armel,ia64,m68k,mips64el,mipsel,ppc64el,riscv64,loong64 libopm-simulators-bin deb science optional arch=amd64,arm64,armel,ia64,m68k,mips64el,mipsel,ppc64el,riscv64,loong64 libopm-simulators-dev deb libdevel optional arch=amd64,arm64,armel,ia64,m68k,mips64el,mipsel,ppc64el,riscv64,loong64 libopm-simulators-doc deb doc optional arch=all python3-opm-simulators deb python optional arch=amd64,arm64,armel,ia64,m68k,mips64el,mipsel,ppc64el,riscv64,loong64
